pages.text: The $(mob)Guardian of Gaia$() is a boss summoned by performing the $(thing)Ritual of Gaia$(). As it spawns, it traps nearby players in its arena, preventing them from running away, but disappears if all players manage to leave it.$(p)It teleports around in its arena, summoning various magic attacks on nearby players that can deal high amounts of damage if not dodged.
$(li)320 Health per nearby player$()$(li)15 Armor ($(thing)Ritual of Gaia II$())$()

The $(mob)Guardian of Gaia$() gives $(item)Gaia Spirits$() to all players that hit it on death. These are used to craft a large variety of late game items, but can also be crafted into $(item)Gaia Spirit Ingots$() in order to perform the $(thing)Ritual of Gaia II$().

If the $(mob)Guardian of Gaia$() was summoned by the $(thing)Ritual of Gaia II$(), it will give a multitude of other items, including a $(item)Dice of Fate$(). Using it gives the user one of the 6 $(thing)Relics of the Aesir$(), powerful artifacts that can only be obtained once per player.
